list_definition.mean_english: đơn vị đo chiều dài (2,54 cm)
list_definition.definition: (often abbreviated to inwhen written) a measure of length, the twelfth part of a foot (2.54 centimetres)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The picture measures 8 inches by 5 inches.
There is not an inch of room to spare.
He inched (his way) along the narrow ledge.

Sixteen inches down, a horizontal bar is anchored to this vertical and spans to the opposite frame.
The basic uncertainty in pressure readings was estimated t o be 0.003 vertical inches of water.
He was 5 feet 6 1/2 inches tall with dark skin, hazel eyes and black hair.
The advances are undeniable, especially in electoral matters as opposition parties have inched their way into elected office at various levels.
Inch by inch the disturbance rises as if the desert were rising in obedience to some upthrusting force beneath.

He was 5 feet 8 inches tall and had brown hair with hazel eyes and a fair complexion.
